amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to allow categorical eligibility for the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

action.text: Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 738.
Amendment SA 810 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 182.
